attributes.action: Resign immediately, and to accept this petition as a public Vote of No Confidence in his leadership; his ministers and his government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned have No Confidence in The Prime Minister' abilities to lead this country, in light of his record on:
[1] The treatment of this country's armed forces and their families
[2] The real and constant cutting of the defence budget - when compared to real defence system inflation rather than high street
[3] Hs inability to manage real (rather than hypothetical) financial situations with specific reference to Northern Rock
[4] His determination to impose a national data-gathering system for a variety of reasons when he is clearly incapable of managing that data safely
[5] His Government's constant interference, manipulation and distortion of this country's values, freedoms and way-of-life, through a variety of largely unworkable bills.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
